content:
I'm happy to help! Congratulations on redeeming those points for a discount on diapers and formula last Saturday!

To find digital coupons and sales on diapers and formula at ShopRite, I recommend checking the following sources:

1. **ShopRite's website or mobile app**: Visit ShopRite's website ([www.shoprite.com](http://www.shoprite.com)) or mobile app to check their weekly circular, digital coupons, and sales. You can browse through the "Digital Coupons" section and filter by category (Baby & Toddler) to find relevant offers.
2. **ShopRite's loyalty program**: Since you've already redeemed points, you might have access to exclusive offers or discounts through their loyalty program. Log in to your account on the ShopRite website or app to see if you have any personalized offers.
3. **Manufacturer websites**: Visit the websites of popular diaper and formula brands (e.g., Pampers, Huggies, Enfamil, Similac) to check for digital coupons, promo codes, or special offers that can be used at ShopRite.
4. **Coupon websites and apps**: Websites like Coupons.com, RetailMeNot, or apps like Fetch Rewards, Ibotta, or Checkout 51 often feature digital coupons and offers for diapers and formula that can be used at ShopRite.
5. **ShopRite's social media**: Keep an eye on ShopRite's social media pages (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram) for exclusive promotions, sales, or digital coupons.

Remember to always check the expiration dates and terms of any digital coupons or offers you find to ensure they're valid for your shopping trip.

If you need help with anything else or have more questions, feel free to ask!
